title: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. <Provide details of step 1 here>
OB: No default value is set. After step 5, the OK button is still enabled.
EB: The default value should be 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be disabled.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter. Set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input the values 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and select 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. <Provide details of step 5 here>
